targets.query:
SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Load Power"
FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/total\/load_power\/state/
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Grid Power"
FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/total\/grid_power\/state/
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Pv power"
FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/total\/pv_power\/state/
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Voltage" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/pv_voltage_1\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Current" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/pv_current_1\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Voltage" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/pv_voltage_2\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Current" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/pv_current_2\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Power" FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/pv_power_1\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Power" FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/pv_power_2\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "PV Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/pv_power\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Bus Voltage"
FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/total\/bus_voltage\/state/
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/load_power\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/grid_voltage\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/grid_frequency\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/ac_output_voltage\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Total" FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/ac_output_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") AS "Battery Temperature" FROM "state" WHERE "topic" =~ /.+\/battery_\d+\/temperature\/state/ ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last("value") AS "Battery Temperature Env" FROM "state" WHERE "topic" =~ /.+\/battery_\d+\/temperature_env\/state/ ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT last("value") 
FROM "state"
WHERE "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/temperature\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/battery_current\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") AS "Total" FROM "state" WHERE $timeFilter AND "topic" =~ /^.+\/total\/battery_current\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Load Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/battery_\d+\/temperature\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") 
FROM "state"
WHERE "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/temperature\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Battery Voltage"
FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/inverter_\d+\/battery_voltage\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Battery state of charge" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/total\/battery_state_of_charge\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Battery Power"
FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /.+\/total\/battery_power\/state/
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: select rp from forever.rp_config where time >= now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1
list.label: Retention Policy
list.name: rp
list.query: select rp from forever.rp_config where time >= now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1
